name: chaincode
description: Chaincode con contratos ping y calculadora

scripts.start:external: npm run build && (export CHAINCODE_SERVER_ADDRESS=0.0.0.0:9998 CHAINCODE_ID=basicts_1.0:486db954d95402cd461a20964526eb709c773f999b46ec6722cb59a2a92e674d && fabric-chaincode-node server --chaincode-address=$CHAINCODE_SERVER_ADDRESS --chaincode-id=$CHAINCODE_ID)
